summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TradeLingo app home screen redesign. All core functionality working perfectly including login, onboarding flow, and new home screen design with stats cards, recommended section, skill mastery, and navigation.
passed_tests: Login screen displays correctly with dark theme (#0d1117 background) and blue accents
TradeLingo branding and 'Master Smart Money Concepts' subtitle are properly displayed
User can successfully login with rsilva@test.com / Test123456 credentials
Onboarding flow works correctly with trading decision buttons (Comprar/Esperar/Vender)
Onboarding navigation works with Continuar/Entendi/Começar buttons
Home screen shows proper welcome header with username (RSILVA) and level badge (⚡ 1)
4 stats cards are perfectly implemented with correct gradients and values:
- Accuracy: 60% (teal/green gradient background)
- Patience: 2 (gold/amber gradient background)
- Decisions: 10 (blue gradient background)
- Streak: 0 (purple gradient background)
Recommended For You section displays 'Continue Your Journey' with skill description
Skill Mastery section shows 3 skills with progress bars (all at 0% initially):
- Identify Trends
- Spot Consolidation
- Trend vs Range Decision
Bottom navigation bar is visible with Learn, Backtest, Journal, Profile tabs
All backend APIs working correctly (100% success rate from backend tests)
User authentication and session management working properly
Dark theme consistently applied across all screens
Responsive design elements properly scaled for desktop viewport

success_percentage.backend: 100% (14/14 tests passed including auth, curriculum, and real market APIs)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All 7 required features implemented and working perfectly)
